main_conferences.name: ESOP
main_conferences.description: An annual conference devoted to fundamental issues in the specification, design, analysis, and implementation of programming languages and systems.

categories.description: Articles that advance the state-of-the-art on the theory and practice of programming languages and systems.
Articles reporting on systems and techniques developed in practice, such as artifacts, tools, mechanized proofs, and educational systems.
Articles that promote new insights on programming languages and systems in a particularly elegant way.

submission_information.submission_process: Submissions must be double-blind, and authors should not identify themselves either explicitly or by implication.
